info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 3:08PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oneida and central Madison Counties through 345 PM EST... At 308 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stockbridge, or near Oneida, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utica, Oneida, Kirkland, Paris, New York Mills, Sherrill, Stockbridge, Augusta, Clinton and New Hartford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
